mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_BIR FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_DELETE IS NULL
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP , MEM_MAIL, MEM_ADD1, MEM_MILEAGE , MEM_BIR , ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CART_PROD) FROM CART WHERE CART_MEMBER = MEM_ID ) PROD_COUNT FROM MEMBER

WITH CARTVIEW AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CART_MEMBER, CART_PROD FROM CART ), PRODVIEW AS ( SELECT PROD.* , LPROD_NM FROM PROD INNER JOIN LPROD ON(PROD_LGU = LPROD_GU) ) SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE , PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE , LPROD_NM FROM MEMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN CARTVIEW ON (MEM_ID = CART_MEMBER) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODVIEW ON (CART_PROD = PROD_ID) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DELETE='Y' WHERE MEM_ID=#{ memId}
